website_summaries.verdict: The ability to tear these sheets into small squares via the perforation makes it an impressive choice for families to use on a day-to-day basis.
pros: These rolls allow users to tear sheets into quarters, helping to conserve paper when only a small square of paper towel is needed
This allows these towels to easily double as napkins
cons: It can be tough to tear a square without tearing off a full half sheet sometimes

customer_reviews.title: These are paper towels
customer_reviews.text: They do paper towel things really well. They dry my hands after I wash them. They wipe up beer when I spill it. And you can tear them down to half as small as other size-adjustable paper towels. If you are looking for paper towels, these are them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent and convenient squares
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe that I'm writing a review on paper towel but these are the best we've used and our repeat orders prove it. I consider myself budget aware and numerous times I've been distracted by the weekly specials at the local store on paper towels only to find that I use twice as much, twice as fast. The Brawny tear-a-square towels are firstly very absorbent, secondly, because you can rip off a small square they are extremely economical. I can't count the number of times in the past that I've torn off a whole sheet of paper towel just to wipe a drop of sauce from the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Seanysean

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to year off smaller squares! I feel like I’m able to save money by not having to use a whole towel when it’s not necessary. Great napkin size too.
customer_reviews.author: Redlouts73

customer_reviews.title: Hey It's Brawny!
customer_reviews.text: The select a size a great feature. Full sheet, half sheet, or quarter of a sheet. Easy to tear off of the roll.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Posting
customer_reviews.text: You think you are buying 12 rolls, but it's not true. Once you get down to the description it says you are only getting six! Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like every paper towel I’ve tried lately, these smell bad, like woodsmoke when wet. Awful!
customer_reviews.author: C. Parker

customer_reviews.title: The towel rolls are "shorter" than typical rolls
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the squares yet, but just wanted to note that I thought these would be 'full-size' rolls, as in the same HEIGHT as normal rolls - but they appear to be a shorter, stubbier version. Which is fine if that's what it takes to have the 'square' concept work, but I wish I would have known.
customer_reviews.author: TheBestEver

customer_reviews.title: Love these paper towels.
customer_reviews.text: I love these paper towels!! Instead of only being able to select half a paper towel, these are divided into quarters. Why didn’t anyone think of this before? Brilliant, Brawny!!
customer_reviews.author: SukeyNY

customer_reviews.title: Nice paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Our usual Select-a-Size paper towel brand was unavailable so I came to Amazon for these Tear-a-Square Brawny paper towels. They have more sheets per roll but that's because their sheets are 5 3/4 inches wide compared to the usual brand we use that are 7 inches wide (see photo). Not a big deal. Good substitute for our usual brand. I used to use Brawny for years and am still a fan. Nice and absorbent which is what I need for spills.
customer_reviews.author: Botchulism

customer_reviews.title: "Tear a square" - dumb idea
customer_reviews.text: I hate these and can't wait to be dine with them and go back to regular paper towels. Every time I go to tear a sheet or half-sheet, I am stuck with a 1/4 or 3/4 sheet. Useless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Finn Markmanrud

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality Paper Towel (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: We formerly used another big brand of paper towels but upon trying this one, changed over. To me, it's a better quality in terms of sturdiness. The absorbancy is the same and I do indeed find that I don't use as much or as many sheets as I once did. This of course, makes it more economical. I'm hoping that Brawny doesn't decide to do away with this as I don't foresee changing to another brand moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: bwdan2003

customer_reviews.title: It’s the little things
customer_reviews.text: It’s the little things in life that make life just a smidge easier. This is one of them. Such a small thing to be able to tear paper towels into squares, but as a full-time mother of 3, this is huge because now I can hand near squares of paper towels to the kids for their meals and Art projects without having to unevenly rip large sheets. I’ve managed to impress other moms who have come over to my house as well. They are amazed at this banal household product that actually makes life a little more convenient and I tell them to go and Subscribe on Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: TXLA

customer_reviews.title: Over priced not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Awful and overpriced. I’m a bounty person but during COVID needed paper towels so I bought these overpriced paper towels. Couldn’t even see the line to quarter cut the sheet and they are not absorbent at all. You need the whole sheet just to wipe your hand.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Paper is old and falling apart, seller should be ashamed
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd managed to find paper towels but was mistaken. These are yellowing and falling apart. But since I don't have many options will just use them rather than hassling to return for refund. If you're looking for high quality new paper towels, these ain't it. And a ripoff to boot, due to all the idiots panic buying and driving up prices. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: McKay Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It’s very bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality of paper is much worse from paper towels bought in Costco of the same brand and more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, but stores were out...
customer_reviews.text: Running low on paper towels. The covid pandemic has people out of control. Slow down! We don’t need to rush and hoard buy right now! Just purchase as normal. But this product is fine, does what it’s needed. But the price is a little high for what is normally in stores. But when you need the product you don’t have much choice to grab what’s available.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was just another gimmick...
customer_reviews.text: but we use the small quarter sheet portion ALL the time. yes, they cost a small amount more but they absorb good enough and hold together great. Not just for picking up small spills, but medium cleaning as well. I find that the with the quarter sheet size, we are using these for napkins as well and have stopped purchasing separate napkins.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Hill

customer_reviews.title: Tear a square not as useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for the tear a square feature since I usually do that with my other paper towels, but I found its not as helpful, since they are not as absorbent. I'm finding I am folding the half sheet in half a lot. The quarter sheet is not enough to dry my hands, maybe just a small mess.
customer_reviews.author: JohnD

customer_reviews.title: great value and great towels.
customer_reviews.text: This paper towel is ny favorite. I wait till it has a sale. I don't buy any other cause some are awful.
customer_reviews.author: karola hood

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing how much higher quality these are then other traditional or discount brands. The price you pay is well worth it, and it even lines up with other brands. But, the quality of the product and having the multiple tearable sheets really make it stand out. I have never thought about downgrading to a different paper towel brand since we started buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Dan M

customer_reviews.title: Double roll!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I've passed up a double roll option before, but this is by far a great deal. Until another comes along, we've added this to our quarterly pantry order, for a business use item. Absorbent, does not have lint, heavy duty towel stands up to wet messes, sticky messes and dirt add heavy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and choice!!
customer_reviews.text: There's just no comparison where quality is the most important feature in my choice of paper towels. Brawny has always been the leader in quality and now in innovation with the new Tear A Square option. Love my Brawny!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get (5) items on auto-delivery for 15% savings
customer_reviews.text: Brawny is the best quality paper towels for the money! With auto-delivery.... I save 15% each month: *** The Brawny case, the Scotts TP case, then (2) cases each of NEO Super Water 33.8oz & 20oz. case, then the best Merv 12 filters one each month. The Brawny put me at the 5th item. It adds up. Amazon Auto delivery is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: PBear

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: There aren't any better paper towels than these. I don't see how. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: John Dobbs

customer_reviews.title: YELLOW! Likely old stock.
customer_reviews.text: These are all yellowed; like old stock. Will not order again. Only keeping due to pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: No waste and product lasts longer!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Brawny for it's great absorbance; but the best thing is the small serrated squares they added. I don't like to waste paper as I'm always looking for ways to cut down and be cognizant of environmental concerns and by making it so l can easily tear off just the right amount, well, that's great!
customer_reviews.author: sugar magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Family Staple
customer_reviews.text: brawny has been my families go to paper towel for more years than I can count. Never disappoints. ove the tear away select a size option for smaller messes and super absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great, Quarter Size Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Buying these in bulk on Amazon has been great. I hate having to lug them home from the grocery store. Price is great per roll, and it is great that they are perforated for quarter sheets, so I can only tear what is needed. I use subscribe and save so I don't have to remember to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rumsch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the whole “tear-a-square” thing was a gimmick but I am loving it now! It’s great for when you just need a small little piece or want to break the paper towel up to put in school lunches as napkins. Brawny is pretty good quality and we would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: capricorn vegetarian

customer_reviews.title: Brawny over Bounty
customer_reviews.text: Every time I go to the store they are out so last year I started purchasing other paper towels and was very disappointed at the amount that had to be used compared to Brawny. Found Brawny on Amazon and having them delivered is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: kim maher

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same quality of Brawny that I purchase at the store. Very poor and it does not have "Brawny" stamped on the papertowel.
customer_reviews.author: KDixon

customer_reviews.title: These are great paper towels
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit expensive but very usable far beyond your standard paper towels. Too bad they are so hard to find right now.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Menke

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating packaging!!
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer decided to glue the box shut, and tape it. In order to get the product out I had to cut the entire box in half, after which time my hands were tired, the struggle was overly frustrating for about 10 minutes while I attempted to rip the box, finally cutting the box off where there was no hard impenetrable glue under the tape layers.
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Great thick paper towels, if they are in stock
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been happy with another brand of paper towels, but ordered these when the store’s supplies started to deplete rapidly. These towels were great! Thick, absorbent and the option of the sizes is a fantastic idea. Unfortunate I haven’t been able to order any more. They are always out 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Came  a day late but ok
customer_reviews.text: Paper towels in bulk I'm so glad you sell on Amazon It's so hard for me to go thirty miles in the snow so now I can get it delivered to my door I no longer have to make two trips food tp paper tpwles and Kleenex because it all wont fit in the car thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Love the small square size paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I thought select a size paper towels were the greatest idea ever since often times I did not need a full sheet to clean up smaller messes. Now that Brawny has come up with tear-a-square paper towels, I officially think this is the greatest idea ever. It has the same strength that you come to expect from Brawny but now, you now have the option of a small square pieces of paper towel for even smaller cleanups/touch ups/etc. Overall this is a great value considering how long each roll lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great middle of the road paper towel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brand and excellent quality. It is not as absorbent as Bounty, but it is cheaper which made it a great deal. I don't like the .25 squares. I still use a half or whole sheet. These towels are definitely a step above the generic towels in durability and absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Paper towels had black looking mold like substance on bottom side. Couldn’t use them
customer_reviews.text: Paper Towels had black looking mold on bottom of all. Must of been in Warehouse on floor n there was a water damage.
customer_reviews.author: pee

customer_reviews.title: Save money,save waste with these tear-a-square towels.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these towels. They are as good as Bounty towels, but the select-a-size goes further, letting you tear off a small square for cleaning a small area. They go much farther with this additional size option. Unfortunately they have been back-ordered a long time now.
customer_reviews.author: Mspreitz

customer_reviews.title: Great size selection
customer_reviews.text: The really like the fact that you have so many choices in size. My kiddos use the small square ones and it’s perfect for their little faces.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie Earl

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency!
customer_reviews.text: Thought by ordering on line the quality would be the same as in your nearest convenient store. Decide to order again, I recieved in my second order box again several rolls larger than the rest. Inconsistency speaks volume. Doesn't have the same absorbency or softness. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lrj

customer_reviews.title: Preferred brand
customer_reviews.text: I love that each sheet also separates into an individual square for when you don’t need a full sheet. These are my favorite paper towels yet!
customer_reviews.author: Buckwheat91

customer_reviews.title: Love the size selections.
customer_reviews.text: I love these towels because you can split the piece in half to have a little square. Sometimes you just need a small piece so it’s nice not to waste so much when you only need a little bit. They are absorbent and have a good texture. My new favorite paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok. I guess.
customer_reviews.text: How long before we get 8 squares per sheet? I only find them useful if you are blowing your nose. Otherwise the individual squares are just too small to justify tearing them off. The roll looks weird with a 1/2 sheet hanging off it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are the most absorbent paper towels! Which means not using as much! I also love that you can tear them in half. Which saves a lot. Much better than any other brand! Will buy these again Please let me know if you found this review helpful:)
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok value, but leaves paper towel fibers on everything you clean.
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. Won’t purchase again. One big issue, they leave little fibers everywhere. When you use them to clean something, you’re left with tiny bits of paper fibers everywhere, which basically becomes “dust” in the household. Use one to dry a plate off - the plate then has little “hairs” on it. If you’re ok with that, then these are fine. Back to bounty for me though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love new 1/4 size pieces for small wipe ups.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these paper towels. I love the new quarter size too as I don't see the need for waste if you're not using the whole piece or 1/2 piece for anything. I also use microfiber cloths to cut down on paperwaste as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: ARRANTHA

customer_reviews.title: had to double up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the idea that I can't use smaller pieces and I was wrong! This is too thin for most job I need. I had to use more to clean so I don't see the using just 1/4 size would do except in very rare cases. In fact I had to double up on most job so in the end it's not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Egg

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have these on auto-ship, and I am very pleased with the absorbancy and price for the quantity. Only downside is finding room to store so many rolls in my small apartment, but the value for a delivered item like this is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The quarter sheet design is second to none
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough how much we love these paper towels! We have been subscribed to receive them now for months and if we end up needing to pick up any other brand in between, they always let us down. The best feature is the quarter sheet option which we use more often than not. I imagine it cuts down on so much waste, especially compared to full sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Sherston Webb

customer_reviews.title: Same good quality
customer_reviews.text: Large amount, bounty is expensive so if you buy this brand you already know that. I choose to buy it because we can use a smaller piece and try to use less. We did use less at first but now not so much we usually use a half sheet or a while ( 4 squares) so it is not saving me money in that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to have gotten the paper towels, but I had to get my package from the first floor, Iam a senior citizen with a bad knee and no elevator. it could have been left in front of my door. NOT THE first floor.
customer_reviews.author: mrs diggy

customer_reviews.title: From a paper towel snob
customer_reviews.text: I’m definitely picky about my paper towels. As a result of not being able to find my brand locally I have tried several other brands. This is my first experience with Brawny in years, not sure if it’s new and improved. I love these paper towels. The square perforated option is the smartest idea. The paper towels are durable and absorbent. These were pricey, $25 for 12 double rolls. I would buy them again if I couldn’t find my go to brand though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size's for every need!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these paper towels... choosing the size down to a napkin size square is just perfect. It is surprising just how often you only require the small square to wipe up those little spills. I will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: KymberLunas, of Eastern Washington

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: THANK YOU!!!! SO HAPPY TO HAVE MY TOWELS!!!! THANK YOU!!!!
customer_reviews.author: KimItemMinistries

customer_reviews.title: I Didn't Know Brawny Made Cheap Toilet Paper
customer_reviews.text: Shocked and disappointed! I subscribe to receive Brawny regularly and even store brand paper towels have better quality than the latest package I received. The plys are completely separate from each other and ROUGH and THIN--ugh. I would return this but don't want to wait in a post office line.
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with these paper towels. I do a lot of cleaning and am particular to the quality of paper towels, and these are very close to the quality of Bounty. I am impressed with the extra bonus of the small squares option. Saves on a lot of paper towel when you only have a small mess. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Best Paper Towels
customer_reviews.text: Even before the pandemic, we've been big fans of Brawny paper towels. They are highly absorbent and each roll goes a long, long way. I'm glad that we didn't have to wait long to get them shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good paper towels
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? These paper towels work wonders. They are strong and absorbent and our much better then non-name brand towels. When I can't get to a store, Amazon brings them to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chi

customer_reviews.title: Sheets are super thin
customer_reviews.text: Brawny must have changed the thickness. The last case I bought were thick and absorbent. I bought the exact same case. This case has very thin, almost generic type sheets and they don’t absorb as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Spallas

customer_reviews.title: one time purchase the pice is to much.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product but the price is so high
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Kamerick

customer_reviews.title: Love it for small and big messes
customer_reviews.text: Great paper towel brand and great paper towels, but I LOVE this tear a square design because sometimes you just don't need that whole paper towel sheet and I would manually have to tear it in half. These rolls are already pre-cut that way and allow you to quickly grab the sheet you need, clean up your mess and be on your way. Don't need to manually cut it anymore and then find out where to put the second half of the sheet until it was ready for use again. Love this design!
customer_reviews.author: Zebarth

customer_reviews.title: Love these paper towels,Thank you for Fast Delivery  during these hard times
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these paper towels for some time Excellent Value ,lasts long time Seller ships fast and very understanding Thank you for excellent service during these hard times.
customer_reviews.author: Ekim6012

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: I really like that you can literally choose what size paper towel you need. The squares make convenient coasters if you don't have anything else, or just need to clean up a small spill.
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Big rolls as well as very absorbent. I also love that you can get squares so not as much waste if you only need a small one. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dreyc + HaileyJ

customer_reviews.title: 4 Way WHAT?!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew one day I would be writing a paper towel review. The 4 day SS is awesome. Not as thirsty as bounty but they are GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: John 3

customer_reviews.title: Unique select-a-size - can be divided into quarters
customer_reviews.text: Brawny always delivers value, but what's different about this is the unique select a size. Not only can you select a half sheet and waste less, you can also divide THAT sheet into a quarter sheet! Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kat J

customer_reviews.title: Rough texture good for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I will use for cleaning and catching liquid, as in draining bacon. I love Viva for replacement tissues; these are too rough for that use, but good for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: jkb

customer_reviews.title: Legit item, love the 4 squares
customer_reviews.text: These are great paper towels. I love how they tear off into 4 squares...helps make them last longer. I've bought these a couple of times now
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: My households first choice in paper towles!
customer_reviews.text: Love the vesitile size options. I also used these to make DIY sanitizing wipes. Just bend the cardboard roll inside and slide it out, then grasp both ends and pull slowly to get to small roll. I reused a Lysol wipe container and filled the container with 70% rubbing alcohol and the paper towels. The smell is strong but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Lusiani

customer_reviews.title: Tear A Sheet Bounty Paper Towels
customer_reviews.text: These paper towels are so absorbent and tough. Also, they save on paper usage because I can tear them into quarters and use them for small jobs. Save a tree! Buy these paper towels!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Thick
customer_reviews.text: Thick and absorbant. Once a sparkle fan, now a bounty fan.
customer_reviews.author: annette reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent!
customer_reviews.text: It’s part of my subscription. Can’t use any other brand! Best absorbency ever! I have kids so spills everywhere! And you can cut a little square or a big part
customer_reviews.author: Hector Mancillas

customer_reviews.title: Strong and absorbent paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used Brawny in a long time. When there were no store brand paper towels I bought these. Really nice and I think I like them better than Bounty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth A.

customer_reviews.title: A novel idea
customer_reviews.text: The Tear-A-Square feature got my attention, but I did not really need it. Trying to rip the quarter square, and I end up getting the half. The paper towel is good.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Gray

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Got this to have them at the garage. Usually like to do some DIY stuff. They work great and the price at amazon was much better than brick and mortal stores.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sada

customer_reviews.title: Paper towels and napkins all in one
customer_reviews.text: love these paper towels i feel they last longer due to being able to cut in squares to use as napkins. Also pretty durable when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was sad to hear that the paper towel I ordered and used to clean up our counters was Brawny. She expected better. It fell apart easily when wet and wiping up a counter. We loved the option for sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Product as expected. Good value and much easier that getting it at a store where it Fills your basket & car.
customer_reviews.author: Donanne Bisbee

customer_reviews.title: Decent absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I like the smaller size between perforations. Paper is a little thin.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Save paper and only use what you need
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new Brawny paper towels. I did not realize that they were in square, what a great new way to save paper and only use what you need. LOVE IT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Tear a square saves paper and money
customer_reviews.text: Not my regular brand but Best Buy of a familiar brand. I may keep buying after COVID-19. We like the tear a square feature.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the small square.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the extra small size. Half size is good enough. It's annoying when I try to pull off a half and get a square.
customer_reviews.author: lahdo

customer_reviews.title: Brawny the quicker picker upper
customer_reviews.text: love the variable size towel option. sometimes you need a small piece and sometimes a full sheet and nice to have the option
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Strong eat Paper Towels Ever 😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Amazing paper towels 😍😍😍😍😍😍 I accidentally washed one and it came out just like I took it off the roll Dried it and reused lol You sure do get your money’s worth with this paper towel 💯💯💯💯💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: DebBee

customer_reviews.title: Brawny is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Brawny towels are so absorbent and really do the job. This item arrived promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: watergirl

customer_reviews.title: Love the small square option
customer_reviews.text: I like that these sheets can be torn in quarters rather than just half sheets. They absorb really well too!
customer_reviews.author: May Latte

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes You Just Need A Little Piece
customer_reviews.text: I love how Brawny has made their paper towels stronger so you don't need a whole paper towel. You can use just a small square. Making a roll last a lot longer. More for your money
customer_reviews.author: Sahm

customer_reviews.title: Greta
customer_reviews.text: As always with paper towels, the brand name paper towel are always much better than the cheapo ones.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee22fan

customer_reviews.title: Best paper towel ever!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about versatile- this can be used as a full sheet, a half sheet, or a quarter sheet. Lowers product waste.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Stop carrying heavy things!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love Brawny Tear-a-Square Paper Towels and they are in our order almost every time! The convenience of being able to pre-tear small squares and use those as napkins has reduced waste immensely in this house. Also, the delivery of a case of paper towels to the door is something we could never carry. Everything in bulk now comes from Amazon since becoming severely disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Lyme Lens

customer_reviews.title: Horizontal perforation is hard to tear.
customer_reviews.text: They're Brawny, so they work just fine. However, it is not easy to tear off just a single square, so if that's what you're getting them for, it may not be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Snapdragonflie

customer_reviews.title: Not true squares
customer_reviews.text: Great paper towels but I was expecting the "squares" to be squares. The mid line is not in the middle and I was hoping to stack the squares for art projects. Some rolls are perfect but most aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap
customer_reviews.text: The price isn’t very good. It’s overall good in quality. But i wouldn’t repurchase it because of the price
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Best Made!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, you get what you pay for here. These are by far the best paper towel out there.
customer_reviews.author: Danyial Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Sticking to Bounty
customer_reviews.text: had to use double the sheets to clean same amount of mess compared to what we normally buy
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Best select-a-size option for absorbent paper towels
customer_reviews.text: I stumbled across these when there was a paper towel / tp shortage in the stores due to the pandemic. The best feature is the quarter sheet perforation. Love being able to really select a size. These were absorbent and long lasting. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Did not pick up as well
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that the paper towel were in 4 squares. We had to use more that way.
customer_reviews.author: brenda farlee

customer_reviews.title: Best dang paper towels
customer_reviews.text: Best damn paper towels. I am normally the type to buy what is on sale and not brand loyal. I have to say these are my favorite paper towels because of the square option. Saves so much!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Eflin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the active family of 4 plus a couple furbabies
customer_reviews.text: Another great subscribe and save for our family. Great quality and perfect for the active family of 4 plus 2 furbabies.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Campbell

product_meta.title: Brawny Tear-A-Square Paper Towels, 12 = 24 Regular Rolls, 3 Sheet Size Options, Quarter Size Sheets, 12 Count
product_meta.description: New Brawny Tear A Square paper towels with quarter (1/4) sheets offers three sheet size options so you can use just what you need without the waste. With the option of a quarter sheet, half sheet or full sheet on each Brawny Tear A Square paper towel roll you can choose the right paper towel sheet size to suit your needs. Gone is the guilt of using a full sheet or a half sheet paper towel when only a quarter sheet is needed for your smaller tasks. Like all other Brawny paper towel products, Brawny Tear A Square 2 ply premium white paper towels are strong, absorbent and durable. They are perfect for both tough messes and small everyday clean ups. Use Brawny Tear A Square quarter sheet size paper towels for small spills and quick clean ups, to place snacks, as a napkin or a coaster. Brawny Tear A Square paper towels – the strength of Brawny for messes big, small and anywhere in between. New innovation. Same Brawny.
feature_bullets: Brawny tear a square 2 ply, premium white paper towel has a unique quarter sheet size option with 256 quarter sheets per roll; Brawny tear a square provides a smaller sheet size option for your smaller tasks so that your roll can last longer

Messy surprises lurk all around the house and they come in all sizes; Brawny tear a square paper towels offer three sheet size options in each paper towel roll: Full sheet, half sheet and quarter sheet so you can use just what you need without the waste; Gone is guilt of using a Full or half sheet paper towel when only a quarter sheet is needed for your smaller tasks

Like all other Brawny paper towel Products, Brawny tear a square paper towels are strong, absorbent and durable; They are Perfect for both tough messes and Small everyday clean ups like food preparation and cooking, cleaning glass, kitchen counters and bathroom vanities

Use brawny tear a square quarter sheet size paper towels for small spills and quick clean ups, to place snacks, as a napkin or a coaster: Brawny tear a square has the strength for messes big, small and anywhere in between
This package contains 12 tear a square 2 ply white premium paper towel rolls; Each paper towel roll has 256 quarter sheets; Each quarter sheet measures 5.5 (L) X 5.5 (W) inches
Made with pulp sourced from the Sustainable Forestry Initiative(r) Fiber Sourcing Standard
12 ROLLS/ROLLOS 128 2-PLY Sheets per roll/HOJAS POR ROLLO 645.3 SQ FT (59.9m²) 11 IN/PLG X 5.5IN/PLG (27.9 cm X 13.9 cm)
